section-4-elections_key2: Har 3 months par, Council members elect karne ke liye DISCO elections conduct karwayega.
section-4-elections_key4: Elections se 7 din pehle DISCO nominations ke liya call karega through a message jo sabhi ko visible ho. Elections se 4 din pehle ek reminder bhi diya jayega. Wo candidates jo ki election me particular pro`file` ke liye khud ko contest karna chahte hain, wo khud ko nominate kar sakte hain. Ek student maximum 2 posts ke liye khud ko nominate kar sakta hai.
section-4-elections_key5: DISCO ke announcement ke baad hi Nomination liye jayenge. Nominations is
section-4-elections_key9: Election me har student ek pro`file` ke liye ek hi student ko vote dega. Votes ki counting DISCO karega. Voting anonymous hogi.
section-4-elections_key11: Jis candidate ko sabse zyada vote mile hain, wahi us pro`file` ke liye select hoga.
section-4-elections_key13: GenSec council ke members me se chuna jayega. Saare council members elect ho jaane ke baad DISCO elected council members me se GenSec ki post ke liye nominations mangega.
section-4-elections_key14: GenSec ke liye DISCO fir se voting karwayega. General body ke sabhi members apni pasand ke member ko GenSec chunne ke liye vote karenge.
section-4-elections_key15: GenSec ke appointment ke liye sabse zyada votes paane wale 2 candidates ka Board of Governors interview lenge.
